title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: This magnificent sword boasts an ornate design, combining sleek silver blade elements with intricate gold accents. The blade is adorned with menacing spikes along its edges, symbolizing both power and intimidation in battle. The hilt is elegantly wrapped in black leather for a secure grip, while the cross-guard features decorative motifs that enhance its regal appearance. This weapon is not only a tool for combat but also a testament to craftsmanship, making it desirable for any warrior seeking to wield a piece of artistry in the heat of battle. Perfect for both display and fierce confrontations.
